effect.sun_moon: Heals the user for half the total damage dealt to all targets.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Heals the user for half the total damage dealt to all targets.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Heals the user for half the total damage dealt to all targets.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user attacks everything around it. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by those hit.
